summary: Represented as light armor in-game, these shoes will hold up lightly in battle while your adventurer manages to maintain their stylish look with various matchable lore-friendly styles.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://s17.postimg.org/8oukb9hpb/Untitled_1.png[/img]
Gladiator Sandals [b]UNP UNPB[/b]
Gladiator Sandals, this mod represents gladiator arena boots for a warrior/adventurer/dragonborn.
It is represented as light armor, and can hold up badly compared to other armors but holds up way better than a a clothing item.
Mainly for style, and to show that your character light armor skill is so good that they don't really even give a shit.

[b]The sandals come in 4 awesome styles:[/b]
[color=#b45f06]Brown/Brown-Buttonless
[/color][color=#000000]Black/BlackButtonless
[/color]
These light boots can be created using the tanning rack.
[u]Main ingredients:[/u] Leather and leather strip
[color=#000000][u]Black Variant:[/u] Cave Bear Pelt
[/color][color=#d8d8d8][u]Button Variant:[/u] Iron Ingot[/color]

[i]Also can be added via in-game console '~'
help gladiator


Known issues: If you're using a custom idle, the soles may or may not clip through the map.
[/i][i][color=#cc0000]

Before anyone tries to rant on how this is in another armor set or owned by someone else. Just stop.
This mod is a resource of DAZ3D studios. And you should appreciate the new standalone retexture available.[/color]
[i]
Enjoy![/i][/i]
author: xXDeliteXx
